SELECT name,AsText(address_loc) as address_loc,parkid,'00' mark,x(address_loc) latitude,y(address_loc) longitude,'无' carnum FROM base_parklist_non_cooperation WHERE MBRContains(LineString( Point ( #{latitude} + 2 / ( 111.1 / COS(RADIANS(#{longitude}))), #{longitude} + 2 / 111.1 ), Point ( #{latitude} - 2 / ( 111.1 / COS(RADIANS(#{longitude}))), #{longitude} - 2 / 111.1 ) ),address_loc) UNION ALL SELECT name,AsText(address_loc) as address_loc,parkid,'11' mark,x(address_loc) latitude,y(address_loc) longitude,carnum FROM base_parklist WHERE MBRContains(LineString( Point ( #{latitude} + 2 / ( 111.1 / COS(RADIANS(#{longitude}))), #{longitude} + 2 / 111.1 ), Point ( #{latitude} - 2 / ( 111.1 / COS(RADIANS(#{longitude}))), #{longitude} - 2 / 111.1 ) ),address_loc)
